data.title: Children's Hospital Alliance

data.text:
The CHA and its member trusts work hard to collaborate in the interests of Children and Young People, both across our membership, and working alongside our partners at every level – from national, to regional, to local.

Our member trusts play a lead role within their Integrated Care Systems, regional and specialist networks (including paediatric ODNs) on operational and strategic initiatives to support the health of children and young people.

We hold a quarterly Partnerships Board meeting to share news and views with our partners in child health, and our PMO team and co-chairs regularly check in with our partners to advance shared objectives, including:
